name: Monogrammed Fleece Pocket Scarf
description: This cozy fleece scarf features a pocket at each end, perfect for keeping your hands cozy, or you can tuck one end into the other to secure your scarf around your neck while showing off a beautiful 4 inch monogram* in your choice of thread color. Made to order, these scarves are perfect for gifting! Scarf Measures 8in x 55in long. **Important: Be sure to leave the desired monogram letters (First, LAST, Middle) in the NOTE TO SELLER at checkout, as well as your choice of thread color. Please see our Policies for more info.** Looking for a child's size scarf? Contact Us for a custom order!

name: Monogrammed Handtowel (Single or Pair)
description: This personalized Handtowel, or pair of Handtowels, makes an excellent housewarming, hostess, or newlywed gift! A crisp white cotton handtowel is professionally monogrammed with your choice of large single initial or three-letter monogram, in your choice of thread color. 100% cotton handtowel measures approximately 16 in x 26in **Important: Be sure to leave the desired monogram letter or letters (First, LAST, Middle) in the NOTE TO SELLER at checkout, as well as your choice of thread color. Please see our Policies for more info.**

options.name: Pair of Towels (2) w/ Single Monogram
Pair of Towels (2) w/ Three-Letter Mono

name: Monogrammed Holiday Handtowel
description:
This crisp white cotton handtowel monogrammed in Christmas Red thread and embellished with a festive green ribbon makes the perfect gift for:

-Newlyweds
-Teachers
-Hostess gift
-Secret Santa Exchange
-Family & Friends
-Yourself (You know you'd love a festive towel all your own!)

**Important***
Please leave the following information in the NOTE TO SELLER at checkout: Recipient's Initials* in the following Order (First, LAST, Middle)

Ordering for a married couple? Traditionally the Monogram is listed (Her First Initial, LAST Initial, His First Initial)

Questions? Email before placing your order

*Double check to ensure proper letter placement for your monogram as this is a custom item and refunds are not offered when information is submitted incorrectly during checkout.  Please visit our FAQ/Policy page for more information.

name: Merry Christmas Ruffle Towel
description:
This easy-care towel is a great choice for your Secret Santa parties this Holiday season, and it's just as nice as a hostess gift, or to pretty up your own holiday decor!  

Merry Christmas is machines embroidered with colorfast polyester thread and a cotton fabric ruffle, in sweet candy stripes, is sewn on with a matching ribbon.

This towel measures approximately 15 1/2 x 26 inches.  Easy-Care: machine wash and tumble dry with like items (I wash mine with my other kitchen towels).

name: Melissa W. - Custom Order
description:
Market Gaucho's with Long Sleeved Ruffle Shirt, Scalloped Glasses Embroidery with name, per our Convo. ;-)

Thanks Melissa!

name: Girl's Personalized Santa Hat Shirt
description: This adorable Santa Hat Applique uses festive fabrics to highlight the first letter of your child's name; your child's full name is then embroidered below the letter. Professionally Machine Embroidered on a crisp white, 100% cotton shirt; Girl's Long sleeve style with ruffles at the cuff and hem. **IMPORTANT** Be sure to leave Child's name in the NOTE TO SELLER at checkout, please double check spelling!. See our Policies for more info.** Available Sizes: 18m 2T 3T 4T 5T 6 **Important: Please leave Child's Name in the Note To Seller at Checkout. Double check to ensure proper spelling as this is a custom item and refunds are not offered when information is submitted incorrectly during checkout. Please visit our FAQ/Policy page for more information and size charts.

name: Personalized Candy Cane Shirt
description:
This adorable Candy Cane design features a favorite Christmas treat with your child's first initial highlighted in the center.  Your child's full name is then embroidered below the design.

Professionally Machine Embroidered on a crisp white, 100% cotton, long sleeved shirt.  Girl's Style is with Ruffles, Boy's Style is a plain long sleeve.  

**IMPOTRANT**
Please leave the following information in the NOTE TO SELLER at Checkout: Child's Name*, Shirt Style (Girl or Boy)

Available Sizes:
18m
2T
3T
4T
5T
6

*Double check to ensure proper spelling as this is a custom item and refunds are not offered when information is submitted incorrectly during checkout.  Please visit our FAQ/Policy page for more information and size charts.
